column1: The '''Hair of Galadriel''' was described as golden touched with silver and seemed to shine with the light of the [[Two Trees of Valinor]]. [[Fëanor]] requested a strand of [[Galadriel]]'s hair three times
column2: but she refused each time. [[Gimli]] of the [[Fellowship of the Ring]] was asked which [[Gifts of Galadriel|gift]] he would like prior to leaving [[Lothlórien]]

column5: unless it might be - unless it is permitted to ask
column7: to name a single strand of your hair
column8: which surpasses the gold of the earth as the stars surpass the gems of the mine. I do not ask for such a gift. But you commanded me to name my desire'.|[[Gimli]]

column1: Galadriel's response surprised all of the [[Elves]]
column2: she granted Gimli's wish and gave him three golden strands of her hair
column3: which were later set in crystal as a "pledge of good will between the Mountain and the Wood until the end of days."<ref>{{FR|II8}}</ref>
